content.rendered:
NICKY ZOUVANI
BA (HONS) CEMAP

  • You'll experience an unrivalled customer service
  • We are an independently owned brokerage offering first charge mortgages from the whole of the market.
  • You can contact us 24/7, we're always available to help

Get in touch for a free, no-obligation chat about how we might be able to help you. 

1 Step 1
It's never too early to get in touch

If you are unsure of anything, need help, or want a chat, just ask below

keyboard_arrow_leftPrevious
Nextkeyboard_arrow_right

As Featured In . . .
Previous
Next

Nicky Zouvani BA (Hons) CeMAP

Mortgage & Protection Consultant

I have been working within the finance industry since 2001 specialising in mortgage and protection advice. I love a challenge and really enjoy helping people to achieve the best possible outcome, whether buying a new home, remortgaging their existing property or investing in a buy to let property. I understand the process can be daunting and I ensure that I am always on hand to discuss any concerns or queries making the process as simple as possible.

I live just outside Norwich in a small village with my husband, 2 children and our sausage dog Myrtle. I spend most weekends standing on the sidelines supporting our son and daughter playing football for local grassroots teams. When I get time to myself, I like to spend days out shopping, eating out and socialising with friends.

  • Nicky.Zouvani@ybmortgages.co.uk
  • 07579 774298
Go back
